Package controller

Class AppointmentMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the screen that contains appointment options.
